document_data.caption: The whip variant of the ebon lash
document_data.name: Ebon Lash
document_data.mainbody: An '''''ebon lash''''' was a type of [[Item enchantment|magical]] ''+2 [[scourge]]'' created by the [[Red Wizards]] of [[Thay]] for use by their agents. Though some came in the form of a ''+1 [[whip]]''.
document_data.Powers:
Any person or creature that was struck by an ''ebon lash'' were ''[[daze]]d'' as if they were affected by the [[spell]] of the same name. Additionally, the wielder of the whip could evoke the spell ''[[charm person]]'' once per day,

''Ebon lashes'' that took the form of a scourge were known to inflict intense pain, an effect comparable to the spell ''[[Nybor's gentle reminder]]''.
document_data.Notable Users: * [[Lauzoril]], one of the eight leaders of the Red Wizards of Thay.
